import LineGraph from '../../../../../example/Graphs-Carbon/General/Axes/XAxisAlternateLocale?dev-site-example';

import DataObject from '@cerner/terra-graphs-docs/lib/example-datasets/dataObjects/Line/timeseriesData.js?dev-site-codeblock';
require('details-polyfill')

# X-Axis alternate locale

This is a simple timeseries line graph with German(de_DE) locale.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/js/carbon-graphs.js';
import '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/css/carbon-graphs.css';
```

## Example
<LineGraph />

<details>
<summary style={{fontSize: 24 }}>
<b>Data</b>
</summary>

### Graph Config object
<GraphConfig />

### Data object
<DataObject />
</details>
